text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP While some people fully embrace magical thinking, there are others that can see and interpret the past, recognize the challenges ahead, and know that the mistakes being made right now, are outrageous and deadly. STFU! #COVID19 #MondayMotivaton #TrumpForPrison2020
